actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Veterans' Affairs.

official_title: A bill to amend section 503 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that payments to an individual under a public or private retirement, annuity, endowment, or similar plans or programs shall not be counted as income for pension until the amount of payments received equals the contributions thereto.

summary.text: Provides that payments to an individual under a public or private retirement, annuity, endowment, or similar plans or programs shall not be counted as income for the purpose of determining the amount of a Veterans' pension until the amount of payments received equals the contributions thereto.

titles.title: A bill to amend section 503 of title 38, United States Code, to provide that payments to an individual under a public or private retirement, annuity, endowment, or similar plans or programs shall not be counted as income for pension until the amount of payments received equals the contributions thereto.
